Package org.wmn4j.notation

Class GraceNoteBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wmn4j.notation.GraceNoteBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectableBuilder, OrnamentalBuilder
    public final class GraceNoteBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectableBuilder, OrnamentalBuilder
    Class for building GraceNote objects. The built grace note is cached.

    Instances of this class are not thread-safe.

      • GraceNoteBuilder

        public GraceNoteBuilder​(NoteBuilder noteBuilder)
        Constructor.

        The note builder is copied, so this constructor does not take ownership of it.

        Parameters:
        noteBuilder - the note builder from which all attributes are copied to this grace note builder

      • connectWith

        public void connectWith​(Notation notation,
                        NoteBuilder targetNoteBuilder)
        Description copied from interface: ConnectableBuilder
        Connects this builder to the given note builder with the specified notation.

        The connections set using this method are automatically resolved and built when the note builder is built.

        Specified by:
        connectWith in interface ConnectableBuilder
        Parameters:
        notation - the notation with which this is connected to the target
        targetNoteBuilder - the note builder to which this is connected using the given notation

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache()
        Removes the cached note that was built on the previous call of build.

      • build

        public GraceNote build()
        Creates a grace note with the values set in this builder. This method has side effects. The method calls build recursively on the following NoteBuilder and GraceNoteBuilder objects to which this is tied. Calling this method to create the first note in a sequence of tied notes builds all the tied notes. The Note objects are cached in the builders. In case of tied notes, the temporally first one should be built first.
        Specified by:
        build in interface OrnamentalBuilder
        Returns:
        a note instance with the values set in this builder.
